title: What Does BSR Mean For KDP Low Content Books?

tactics.name: bsr_analysis
tactics.description: Use BSR to estimate daily sales and identify competitive categories
steps: Check BSR rank across Amazon markets
Use BSR sales calculator to estimate daily profits
Analyze category rankings for keyword opportunities
caveats: BSR may not reflect international sales accurately
source_quotes: the lower the rank the better it is selling

tactics.name: BSR and Review Analysis
tactics.description: Evaluate book performance using Best Seller Rank (BSR) and review counts to identify competitive niches.
source_quotes: the lower it is the better your book is selling

heuristics.name: review_volume_heuristic
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize books with strong BSR
source_quotes: if you were going for a simple a similar book

heuristics.name: Review Threshold Boost
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize niches with low competition
source_quotes: the books that are lower this one is one of the kdp ones that one's selling really well

claims.statement: Independently published KDP books often use KDP-generated ISBNs
source_quotes: this particular book is actually made in independent publishing

claims.statement: BSR is the Best Seller Rank, with lower numbers indicating better sales performance.
source_quotes: what is bsr again let's just reinforce it it is the best sellers rank
